titles.title: BLUE Pacific Act
BLUE Pacific Act
Boosting Long-term U.S. Engagement in the Pacific Act
To advance a comprehensive, long-term United States strategy and policy for the Pacific Islands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
